title: how to change my username?
body: i was away for a few months because my computer didn't have enough memory, and while i was away i got hacked on this account. and because of that, that person got me perma banned for scripting. and im pretty sure its because he knew my username to log into my account. is there anyway i can change it? and is there anyway i can get my account back?

replies.body: so, there is no way im getting my account back?

Galacius is pretty much on point here but I can elaborate on the why a little bit more. 

We don't allow people to change their actual username because we need those to stay permanent. Without some type of permenant ID associated with the account, it could cause a mess with some accounts having identical names and such.

Good Aftenoon Deh,

I am sorry to inform you that for both cases - they cannot be changed. 

For the username see this article here --> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ . The summoner name (in-game) can be changed but the username can never be changed.

For the account, the article here https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201898070-My-Account-is-Suspended says "IT WASN'T ME! CAN'T YOU DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS?
Remember that you are fully responsible for all activity made on your account, and if suspensions or bans are incurred we will not be able to modify them. If you feel that your account may have been compromised, please see the following Knowledge Base article for more information and instructions to help recover your account: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account ." 

You are fully responsible for all actions on your account whether you use it, a friend uses it, or if you are hacked. However, you can send a support ticket and ask them what you can do next here https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new and click on "I need help recovering my account."
